bill_title: provide for a fee for an amendment or cancellation of a statement of qualification for a limited liability partnership.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to provide for a fee for an amendment or cancellation of a statement of qualification for a limited liability partnership. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 48-7A-1208 be amended to read as follows: 48-7A-1208. The provisions of § 1-8-10 notwithstanding, the fee for filing the statements and reports provided for in the following sections with the secretary of state is as follows: (1) Section 48-7A-303, Statement of Authority, ninety dollars; (2) Section 48-7A-304, Statement of Denial, ten dollars; (3) Section 48-7A-704, Statement of Dissociation, ten dollars; (4) Section 48-7A-805, Statement of Dissolution, ten dollars; (5) Section 48-7A-907, Statement of Merger, ten dollars; (6) Section 48-7A-1001, Statement of Qualification, ninety dollars ; an amendment or cancellation of a Statement of Qualification, ten dollars ; (7) Section 48-7A-1003, Annual Report, twenty-five dollars; and (8) Section 48-7A-1102, Statement of Foreign Qualification, ninety dollars. 350 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.027 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
